projects.project_description: The Job Portal website is a dynamic and user-friendly career platform designed to connect job seekers with employers. This platform facilitates the job search and application process while offering recruitment solutions. It is optimized for both job applicants and employers, making the experience seamless and efficient.

I built this personal portfolio to showcase my development skills, highlight my experience, and provide an interactive platform for potential clients or employers to explore my work. This project is a reflection of my ability to design, develop, and deploy a responsive and dynamic web application using modern web technologies.
projects.project_tool: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JSON, React JS

projects.project_description: Developed a dynamic, user-friendly website for a men’s grooming salon, allowing customers to easily browse services and book appointments online. Integrated a custom appointment scheduling system that interacts with a MySQL database to manage available times and appointments in real-time.
projects.project_tool: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSON, JSP, MySQL.

projects.project_description: Developed and deployed a full-stack Online Nursery web application where users can purchase a variety of indoor and outdoor plants. The application includes  product listing, and cart functionality. Implemented dynamic frontend using React.js with responsive design through Bootstrap. Built secure and scalable REST APIs with Spring Boot for backend services. Managed and stored data using MySQL
projects.project_tool: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap,  JavaScript, React.js, Spring Boot, Mysql
